inn1.comm: short of a good length outside off, moving away a hint, left alone to the keeper
wide, too wide, moved away further after pitching and Hafeez didn't bother about that one
back of a length outside off, first runs, punched wide of mid-off for a quick single
Complete silence, pitched on the pads and that's his preferred scoring area, flicked through square leg for a boundary
appeal for lbw, nipped back in after landing on leg stump, struck him on the pads as he tried to play it square, would have gone down leg
easy pickings, juicy half-volley on the pads and that's flicked away comfortably to square leg for a boundary
appeal for lbw, that was closer but the inside edge saved him I think, good length on middle and leg and came back in, pushed at that one but there were two sounds there
goodish length on the off, gets front and across and drives it towards midwicket, well fielded by Shakib who dives to his left
punished, short and wide and that's crashed through cover and point for a boundary, smashed
beaten, good length just outside off and nipped back in, Hafeez didn't pick that, played outside the line there and was beaten through the gate
shortish outside off, punched from the crease towards extra cover
shortish on the off, punched off the back foot towards extra cover
he's a good timer of the ball is Hafeez, punched towards cover, effortlessly done but straight to the fielder
bowled it on a good length on middle, gets across and drives that towards mid-on
pitched up and that's driven hard but straight towards extra cover where Mahmudullah saves some runs diving to his right, just the single
short of a good length outside off, crunched towards cover off the back foot
pushed it full on the off, rocks forward and drives that towards mid-off
slower one bowled on a good length on the off, defended towards short extra cover
angling down the pads, tries to clip it fine, flicks the pads and they get a leg-bye
short of a good length outside off, punched towards extra cover
pitched up on the off, rocks forward and defends that with a closed face to midwicket
nicely cracked but the short extra cover is proving to be a problem, nicely timed off the back foot
gets forward to that one, appeared to swing in and defended it towards short extra cover

appeal for lbw, looked very close, ooh, came back in sharply and Hafeez was caught in front of the stumps, struck him in line as that moved back in but would that have gone down leg? Didn't seem like it. May have struck leg, hit him on the back leg. Didn't look like he got an inside edge. Very close call, Hafeez might just be lucky to survive. Hawkeye shows it would have hit middle and leg
pitched it up outside off, steps forward and opens the face to crack it towards point
pushed it full on middle and leg, slower one, gets forward and turns it into the leg side
Jamshed goes! Early wicket for Bangladesh, was the slower one, short of a good length, made room and tried to clear the in-field on the off side but found cover where Mahmudullah took it comfortably
beaten, lovely, teasing delivery outside off, pitched on a length and moved away, Younis chased that and was beaten
short of a good length on the off, rocks on the back foot and plays it back to the bowler
edged and short, another widish delivery and Younis chases that one again, tries to drive that on the up, got a thick outside edge and that landed just short wide of the outstretched hands of slip
shortish on middle, flicked off the back foot through square leg for a couple of runs
short of a good length outside off, rocks back and taps it towards extra cover

Younis Khan has been trapped lbw! Looked really close, that one angled in and nipped in after pitching, Younis moved across and closed the face and was struck in front of off , can't really tell on the first replay. We also need to check if there was an inside edge, Younis wasn't too happy. He has to go, however. Yes, there was an inside-edge, we see that on the second replay, a hint of deviation inwards.
fullish outside off, pushed straight to extra cover
angling in towards middle and leg, clipped past square leg for three runs, Hafeez runs well towards the striker's end
pitched on a length outside off, gets forward and defends it towards point
a bit of away movement there, landed on a good length and darted away, defends it off the back foot in front of cover
closes the face on that one and works it behind square leg for a single
ooh, was uppish, opened the face on that one and sliced it wide of point, Jahrul Islam was in catching range, dived to his left and dropped it, carried but he couldn't get his hands around it
pitched up on the off and that's driven straight towards mid-off
easily done, relieving the pressure with that ill-directed delivery on the pads and it's flicked away through square leg for a boundary
angling in towards off, goodish length on the off, defended off the back foot to the bowler
lands on a length outside off, nips in after pitching, shoulders arms to that one
short of a good length on the off, comes back in, gets forward and defends it with bat close to pad
pitched on a length on the off, presents the face and plays it back to the bowler
driven hard but straight to mid-on, pitched up on the off and drills it down the ground but finds the fielder
angling in towards middle, pitched up and he presents the full face while playing it back
poor delivery, they've bowled these deliveries on the pads far too frequently, flicked away past fine leg for a boundary
lands on a good length outside off, gets forward and defends it towards point
the slower offcutter, Hafeez opened the face and guided that one towards third man for a single
short of a good length on the off, gets on the back foot and taps it to cover
slightly short on the off, gets on the back foot and pushes it to mid-on
slower offcutter there, gets on the back foot and turns it towards midwicket
slower one again, that was pitched up, Hafeez leaned forward and drove it straight to cover
short of a good length outside off, Misbah attempts the cut but can't connect, was short and wide
well fielded at cover, pitched on a length and that was driven hard, Mahmudullah dived to his right and saved a few runs there, kept them to just a single

ooh, nicely timed but that wasn't too far away from the stumps at the non-striker's end, would be interesting to see if Nazmul got a hand to it, driven elegantly through the line and dead straight for a boundary
pushed it full on middle, gets front and across and drives it towards mid-on
horrible delivery, a slower one but wayward, full and down the leg side, Hafeez helps it on its way past short fine leg
short of a good length on middle, whipped through square leg into the deep for a single to keep strike
shortish on middle, rocks back and works it towards midwicket
short of a good length, a bit of away movement on that one, stands tall and defends it towards cover
driven on the up this time, drew him forward, played straight to extra cover
hits a good length this time, Hafeez steps forward and defends that solidly towards mid-off
shortish outside off, crunched wide of point for a single
gets forward and defends it into the off side
slides it wide, shortish and Hafeez chops that one down towards point
floating it towards middle, lands slightly short, punched into the leg side
smartly done by Hafeez, was slower through the air, he waited for it to turn away and guided it behind point for three runs, Shakib gave chase and dragged it back in
angling in towards off, stretches forward and defends it into the off side
gets forward and turns the face to play it behind square leg for a single
tossed up on middle, drives it down towards long-on for a single
short of a good length outside off, Hafeez brings up Pakistan's fifty, guiding it to third man
angling in towards middle, defends it in front of the bowler from the crease
back of a length on the off, knocks it down towards point from the crease
banged short on middle, rolls his wrists over that one and plays it down towards deep square leg
pitched up on middle, drives it down towards mid-on
bowls it short on the leg side, fine leg has been pushed back, Hafeez clips that towards the fielder for a single
flighted outside off, gets forward, opens the face and plays it towards point
flighted on leg stump, gets a big stride out and knocks it into the leg side
tossed up outside off, pitched up, defended with a lunge back towards the bowler
flighted on leg stump, clipped off the pads towards short fine leg
bowled it flat on middle and off, steps back and punches it towards cover
rapped on the pads, went with the arm, struck him outside leg
banged in short outside leg stump, Misbah allows it to go through, called a wide
pitched up on the off, drives it through the line towards mid-off
short of a good length on middle, turns it through square leg for a single
good length on the off, gets on the front foot and taps it towards extra cover
short outside off, cut away down towards third man for a single

run-out, another wicket, Nasir Hossain is an excellent fielder, that was defended in front of him at point, Misbah took off and then hesitated, Nasir ran in from point, picked it up and aimed accurately at the non-striker's end, Misbah has to go, he was well short
angling in towards off, goodish length, opts to play that off the back foot and defends it into the off side
bowled it flat outside off, cracked through towards deep cover for a single
angling in towards middle, gets on the back foot and stabs it into the off side
angling in towards middle, stretches forward and dabs it into the leg side
flighted on middle, drives it back down the pitch
arm ball on the off, made room and cut it down to point
slightly short on the off, pushed off the back foot to mid-on, pinches a quick single and makes it in time
short of a good length on the off, gets back and knocks it down on the pitch
pushed in towards the off stump, lands on a length, drives it straight to mid-on
nicely timed and a misfield by Razzak at mid-off, rushed in to prevent the single there but couldn't pick it up cleanly, two more
shortish on the off, drags it through square leg for a couple more runs, fine leg is inside the circle
angling in towards off, a tight line and it's defended solidly back to the bowler
bowled it full on the pads, flicked away towards deep square leg for a single
shortish outside off, chopped towards point
angling in towards leg stump, struck on the pads, that held its line, would have gone down leg
steps forward and defends that into the off side
short, whipped off the back foot through square leg for a single
shortish outside off, turning away, rocks back and crunches it towards point
short of a good length on the off, steps on the back foot and plays it to mid-on
pitched up on the off at 133kph, gets across and drives it down to mid-on
full on middle, drives it sweetly but straight to mid-on, no single on offer
run-out appeal, pushed it just wide of mid-on and called for a single, no hesitation there, Tamim picks up and throws down the stumps at the non-striker's end but Hafeez is in
back of a length outside off, run down to third man for a single
bowled it full on the pads, flicked away towards deep square leg for a single to keep strike
slow through the air, lands short outside off, guided towards short third
flighted on the off, reaches forward and pushes it towards mid-off
fires it quick on middle this time, steps back and plays it back to the bowler
appeal for lbw, got an inside edge there as he went for the slog-sweep, tossed up on middle and he tried to go over midwicket, would have also gone down leg
gets a big stride out and defends that into the leg side
tossed up outside off, reaches forward and pushes it to extra cover, a maiden over, tight stuff from Bangladesh
dropped it into the off side and they take a quick single
flicked away through square leg for a single
drops that short outside off, runs it down towards third man for a single
short of a good length on the off, punches it back towards the bowler
gets forward and punches that towards extra cover, he's timing them well but can't get it past the in-field
cracks that one through to deep cover for a single to keep strike
short outside off, can't find the gap, cut away towards point off the back foot

the frustration set in and it's cost Hafeez his wicket, he struck that hard but could not get the desired elevation, got to the pitch to that flighted ball and struck it straight into the hands of mid-on where Nazmul took a sharp catch
tossed up on middle, lands full and he defends it into the off side
quicker through the air, lands full and it's pushed back to the bowler
full on the off this time, almost in the blockhole, pushed towards cover
another maiden, short outside off, crunched off the back foot towards cover
short of a length outside off, cracked it hard into the ground towards point
pitched on a length outside off, drives it towards mid-off
a no-ball, not a new problem for Shahadat, shortish on the hips, tries to work it square, gets a leg-bye, freehit coming
Hammad has sent that over the ropes, pitched up outside off and he sensed a chance there, was on a length and he smashed it over the deep extra cover boundary
goodish length on the off, gets forward and defends that to point
short of a good length outside off, taps it behind point for a single
quicker through the air, shortish outside off, cuts down to point
shortish on middle, gets on the back foot and punches it down the pitch
Umar Akmal tries to heave that over midwicket, mistimes, danced down the track to send it into the crowd, gets nothing in the end
drops that in front of extra cover and Hammad responds well to complete the single
played that one late, got an inside edge, a thick one, towards square leg as he came forward there
goodish length outside off, gets forward and drives that on the up towards cover
pushes that off the front foot towards mid-off
shortish on the off, punched in the direction of mid-off from the crease
slightly short on the off, Umar punches that towards long-on for a single
angling in towards middle, gets front and across and defends it watchfully into the off side
short of a good length outside off, cracked towards extra cover
bowled it flat outside off, stretched forward and defended it into the off side
slightly short, pushes it back to the bowler
reaches forward and defends that towards cover
turns the face on that one and clips that towards short fine leg for a single
angling in towards the off stump, defended in front of point
floating it on middle, knocks it down into the leg side
short of a good length, gets on the front foot and pushes it down towards long-on for a single
powerful strike, short, Hammad moved across, picked the length early and smashed it hard over midwicket for a one bounce four, landed just inside the ropes
pitched up outside off, drives it past the diving cover into the deep for a single
punched down the ground towards long-on for a single
good length on the off stump, gets across and defends it towards cover
bowled it full on the off, drives it straight towards extra cover
tossed up on the off, drives it straight to midwicket
flighted on the off, stretches forward and pushes it back to the bowler
short on the off, punches it down to long-on for a single
angling it on middle, gets forward and defends that towards point
crunches that one down towards long-on for a single
flights it on the off, drives that one towards long-off
shortish on middle, gets across to work it through square leg for a single
good length on the off, gets front and across to defend it towards extra cover
that's been thrashed and it brings up the century, low full toss outside off and he drills that through extra cover, all along the ground to beat the fielder in the deep
kept a little low, pushed down the ground towards long-on for a single
pitched on a good length on the off, defended cautiously towards extra cover
Nazmul's hurt himself there, seemed like he twisted his ankle as he tried to deliver, turned out to be a slow, short ball as it slipped out of his hand, Umar pulled that wide of long-on for a single
tossed up outside off, pushed to extra cover
Umar Akmal saw that long hop and made up his mind, waited for it to turn away and then pulled it handsomely over the deep midwicket boundary
quicker ball on the pads, whipped through to deep square leg for a single
these two have a decent partnership going now, cracked off the back foot to deep cover for a single
gets forward and turns that in front of midwicket, Hammad was halfway down the pitch but was sent back in time
tossed up, drives that one down the ground to long-off for a single
flat on middle, gets on the back foot and turns it into the leg side towards square leg
bowled that flat outside off, opens the face to play it short third
Hammad fetches that from outside off and sweeps it hard over square leg, it's struck pretty hard for a boundary
flighted on the off, presents the full face while playing it back down the pitch
sweeps that through square leg for a single, much gentler this time
tossed up on the off, reaches forward and defends that to cover
angling in towards middle and leg, clipped through square leg for a single
flighted outside off, drives it towards deep point for a single
appeal for lbw, went for the sweep, tried to play it fine, big appeal from Shakib as he tried to take it from outside off, struck him outside the line there, two more, brings up the 50-stand
drives it down the ground towards long-on for a single
drives it down the ground to long-off this time, one more, a good stand building
squeezes that one past cover for a single to keep strike
bowled it on middle and leg, gets on the back foot to play it to midwicket
sweeps that one well, past short fine leg for a couple of runs as deep square leg runs across and cuts it off
shortish on middle and leg, gets back and turns it towards short fine
quicker ball and that was struck well, he spotted it quickly and jabbed it towards deep midwicket for a single
waits for it to turn in and guides it wide of point for a single
short outside off, quicker through the air, tried to open the face there, missed
tossed up on the off, drives it towards long-off for a single
angling in towards the off stump, defended towards cover
A wicket at the wrong time for Pakistan, shaped up for the slog-sweep, tried to clear midwicket, that short had worked well for him, ended up getting a top-edge and Shakib ran back and judged it well
flighted outside off, drives it towards extra cover
fires it short on the off, Afridi went for the big one, danced down the track and cracked it down the ground to long-off, was aiming for much more there
pushes that down the ground for a single towards long-on
turns that in the direction of square leg for a single
pitched on the off, drives that towards long-on for one more
steps on the back foot and punches that towards midwicket

caught-behind, Pakistan in further trouble, Umar Akmal is furious, that landed on leg stump and turned further down, Umar tried to work that behind square, replays didn't show a clear contact with the bat there, it may have flicked the trouser on the way to Mushfiqur, who took it well. Plenty of doubt there but the umpire had none, he raised his finger, Pakistan in deep trouble now.
turned away through square leg for a single
shortish on the off, punched towards extra cover
punched off the back foot towards cover
tries to take that from outside the off stump, goes for the sweep, struck on the pads
Afridi finds the gap, he'll want to take most of the strike this Powerplay, short outside off and he hammers that between cover and point
tossed up on the off, drives it down the ground to long-off for a single
four more, fired in short on middle and he's attacking, moves back and pulls that over midwicket, powerfully struck
shortish on the off, pushes it back towards the bowler
rocks forward and defends it cautiously this time
another one, makes a bit of room this time and thwacks that through extra cover to beat long-off, shortish and he wasn't to the pitch but he made excellent contact
keeps the strike but cracking it down to deep midwicket for a single
makes room to pull that over midwicket, misses, it clips the pads to beat the keeper and roll down past short fine leg, Shahadat gives chase and drags it back, three leg byes, useful runs these
nicely done by Sarfraz, tossed up and he pushes it down to long-off
tossed up on the off, pushes it back down towards Shakib
fires that one wide but Afridi had already made room, not given a wide but that was fumbled by Mushfiqur, who conceded two byes
low full toss outside off, went for the drive, missed it there, well collected by Mushfiqur
charges down the track this time, gets to the pitch and launches it over mid-on, didn't get hold of it but it was enough to earn him a one-bounce four
short of a good length on middle, punched towards midwicket
pushes that one off the back foot through square leg for a single
slower one, gets outside off and turns it through square leg for one more
short of a good length on the off, punched down to long-on for a single
slower offcutter, knocks it down in front of the vacant midwicket region, Sarfraz is running to the danger end on the second run and completes it in time
Pitched up and that's a monstrous strike, makes a bit of room, takes it from a length and absolutely murders it over the long-off boundary, a flat six
tossed up on middle, backs away and pushes it down the pitch
shortish outside off, punches it towards extra cover
three dots, pushes it firmly but straight to extra cover again
four dots in a row, pushed from the crease towards that same fielder
bowled it flat on middle, defended watchfully into the off side
fires it quick on leg stump and it was going further down, Sarfraz is rapped on the pads as he tries to work it away off the back foot
starts the new spell with a short ball down the leg side which is called a wide
short ball on the off, Afridi went for the pull but couldn't time it well enough, managed to get it over midwicket however, two more
short of a good length on middle, punched off the back foot past midwicket for a single
pitched up on middle and leg, driven towards mid-on
slower one bowled slightly short on the off, can't get it away, he's stagnated for a bit here now has Sarfraz, played straight to midwicket
confusion in the middle, plays it off the back foot to point, wants the single, Afridi responds and then sends him back, all's well in the end
shortish outside off, cut away in the direction of deep point for a single
A couple for Sarfraz who sweeps that past the short fine fielder for a couple of runs
tossed up outside off, drives it past extra cover for a single

Afridi goes! Holes out to a full toss, came down the track to smash that over midwicket but it turned out to be a miscue, got a top-edge and Nasir at long-off ran in and took a good catch diving forward, crucial blow
shortish on leg stump, makes room and chops that towards point
turns the face and works it behind square for a single
floating it on middle, Gul defends that into the leg side
nicely timed, Sarfraz gets on the back foot and punches that short delivery firmly past the diving Mashrafe for a boundary
slipped out of his hand, a full toss, cuts it down towards third man for a single
goodish length outside off, he shoulders arms to that one
shortish on middle, works it away towards fine leg for a single
edged and four, short on the off, tries to pull it through midwicket, gets an inside edge past the diving Mushfiqur for a boundary
bowled that full on middle, drives it down the ground to long-on for a single
two more, fetches that from the off stump and sweeps it wide of deep square leg for a couple
slightly short on the off, pushed it towards extra cover
low full toss, ends up playing it back to the bowler
punched off the back foot to long-on for a single
drags that one wide of midwicket for one more
slips a wide down the leg side, a single to the score
short outside off, cuts it wide of Tamim at point for a single
short on leg stump, turns that one down towards fine leg for a single
gets across and flicks it through square leg, two more as fine leg takes a bit of time to run across and cut that off

Gul has to go, no encore of that performance in the opening game, short on middle, got across to turn it square, closed the face too early and got a leading edge, Shakib took an easy catch at extra cover
short of a good length, guides it down to third man for a single to raise the team's 200
short of a good length on the pads, tries to flick that fine, gets a leg bye as it rolls towards square leg
ooh, thick outside edge, was a full length ball, pushed inside the line to that one, another single
tossed up on the off, drives that towards Shakib at extra cover, who kicks it back to the bowler
fires that down the leg side, a leg-bye in the direction of short fine leg
dropped, Sarfraz slog-sweeps but finds Nazimuddin at midwicket, who times his jump well but can't latch on to that really tough chance, intercepted it with one hand but it didn't stick
whipped through midwicket by Ajmal for a couple of runs
gets forward, closes the face on that one, may have been missing leg as he closed the face on that one
crashed into the stumps, tried to close the face on that one again, it turned away to take out middle and off, another one for Razzak, Pakistan are now nine down
slower one bowled short outside off, chopped down towards point
moves well across to slog that over midwicket, three fielders in the deep on the leg side, doesn't connect
slower one outside off, chopped wide of point for a single
short of a good length on the off, pushed towards mid-on
short of a good length on the off, worked away through square leg for a single
nicely done, Sarfraz plays it smartly, third man is inside the circle, short outside off and he cut it wide of that fielder for a boundary
gets the single he wants, moves across to play it wide of short fine leg for a single
fires it full and wide, Sarfraz was looking to open the face there, missed
full toss on middle and leg, drives it straight towards deep midwicket for a single
fires it straight on middle, gets a big stride out, did that strike him outside the line? Got an inside edge onto the pads
again, he's defending with his bat close to the pads, another inside edge onto the pads
slightly short on middle and off, turns away, defends it into the off side
ooh, moved well away from the stumps and guided that to short third, he wanted to get it past him like he did in the previous over
just the single though he connected that well, stepped outside off this time and swept it to deep square leg
goodish length outside off, that nips away and beats the outside edge as he pushes at that one
bowled it short on the off, punched off the back foot straight to midwicket
pushes that one hard, gets a thick outside edge towards third man for a single
slow full toss, drives it towards extra cover for a single to keep strike for the final over
slower one bowled full outside off, drives it wide of long-off and he wants the second, Cheema responds well and makes it back
missed out there, the slower one bowled full, wanted to cart that over extra cover, couldn't connect
Useful runs these, a no-ball called for height and it's a gift delivery, sliced it away over point for a boundary, five runs
another no-ball, he's overstepped this time, a freehit coming, swings it over midwicket for a couple more

Is he run-out off a free-hit? Slower one bowled short and that was pulled over short fine, Shakib collected in the deep, returned a throw to the keeper who threw it to the bowler, Shahadat collected and it seemed he missed it on the first attempt while trying to take down the bails but did so the second, by that time Sarfraz had made it back, two more runs
mistimes that as he tries to clear mid-off, gets a single, Cheema wants the second and is halfway down the pitch, it's a poor throw from Mashrafe to the keeper and he is able to get back
Pakistan are doing well here, short outside off and Cheema makes room to thrash it through extra cover,
two more, manages to carve that, though he mistimed it, over extra cover for a couple more runs

inn2.comm: tossed up on middle, drives it down towards mid-on
bowling from round the wicket, bowling it full on the off, pushes it back down the pitch
gets a single this time, drives it down the ground towards long-off
ooh, the ball stopped on him there slightly, played back to the bowler just as he checked his shot while turning the face
big cheers for the single, turns that through square leg to get off the mark
bowled it flat on the off, Tamim moves away a hint and defends that towards extra cover
beaten through the gate, goodish length and it keeps a little low, loose shot from Nazimuddin and it zips through the gate as it rolls towards the keeper
angling in towards middle and off, defends that towards the bowler
beaten again, this one goes the other way, nips away after pitching, tries to crash it square but can't connect
beaten again, this one is much closer to the off stump, lands on a good length and darts away, Nazimuddin fishes for that one and it just moves past the outside edge
and again, it's happened four this this over, this one nipped away and he pushed at it loosely once again
leaves it alone this time, on a good length outside off and he shoulders arms to that one, excellent start by Gul, a maiden
bowled it flat outside off, pushed straight to extra cover
driven more firmly this time, lands full and drives it to extra cover again
rocks forward and taps it in front of silly point
this one is bowled straight on middle and leg, turns the face slightly, gets a thick inside edge towards fine leg for a single
flighted on the off, Nazimuddin pushes it back to the bowler
floated it full on middle, pushes it down the ground to long-on for a single
angling in towards middle, gets forward and defends it solidly back to Gul this time
firmly struck, that was pitched on a good length and was square-driven well by Nazimuddin but Hafeez at cover dived full length to his left and kept them down to just the single
lovely shot from Tamim, it rose up to him and he handled it well, short outside off, he stood tall and punched it square, between point and cover, his feet were in the air as he played that one
short of a good length on the off, gets on the back foot and plays it to mid-off
short outside off, shapes up for the cut but can't connect, goes through to the keeper
superbly struck, pitched on a good length and he smashed that on the up, through the line, past extra cover for a boundary
floated it on the off, gets forward and pushes it back to the bowler
gets forward and turns that one towards square leg
closes the face on that one and plays it back down the pitch
tossed up outside off, defended in front of the bowler
much slower through the air, gets forward and dabs it towards point
flighted on middle, drives it down towards long-on for a single to keep strike
dropped that one short on leg stump, would have wanted to get that fine but could not, struck on the hips, just the single off a leg-bye
short of a good length on the off, knocks it down into the off side
short outside off, poor ball from Gul, that's smacked over point for a boundary
shortish on the off, closer to the stumps, knocked off the back foot towards midwicket
Tamim's looking very good here, confidently played, gets forward to the pitch and eases it through extra cover for a boundary
pushes it towards mid-on and gets a quick single, a good steady start from Bangladesh
Cracks that one straight into the silly point fielder
floating it on the off, drives it past the bowler for a single to long-off
turning in from a good length, chips it towards midwicket
on middle, gets forward, closes the face on that one and rolls that in front of mid-on for a single
Tamim gets a stride out and drops that in front of midwicket, no run on offer there
tossed up on leg stump, pushes it towards midwicket
starts with a wide down the leg side, landed on leg and spun down further
flighted on middle, drives it firmly towards long-on for a single
flatter, just a fraction outside off, lands on a length, steps forward to the pitch and defends
angling in towards off and middle, gets a big stride out and presents the full face
this one turns away, short of a good length, gets back and punches it towards point

in that gap between keeper and leg slip, angling on the pads and Tamim tried to close the face on that one, did that catch the bat? Seemed to deflect off the pads through that gap to the fine-leg boundary, but it's given runs
angling in towards the off stump, pushed away into the off side
short of a good length, turning in, worked away to square leg
floating it on middle and leg, closes the face to work it to midwicket
shorter, turns it away past square leg for a single
angling it on the pads, clipped towards fine leg for a single
bowled it flat on the pads, clipped to square leg, Nazim wants the single but Tamim sends him back, wisely
gets on the back foot and just dabs it wide of midwicket to steal a quick single

appeal for lbw, tossed up, Nazimuddin stepped across to swing it over square leg, ooh, looked really close, didn't strike him outside the line, seemed to strike him in line, we need to check on the height. Struck him in line with off and middle. Very close, many would have given that out, would have gone on to hit the stumps
the doosra, didn't pick it, turned the face on it too early
tries to defend it with bat close to pad, may have been going down
turned in from a good length outside off, pushed it back down the pitch
a maiden, tries to play it square, strikes him on the thighs, no single on offer
fumble at point allows them a single, Umar Akmal the culprit, gets on the back foot and cuts it toward shim
quicker through the air, drives that towards long-off for a single
flighted outside off, sliced it past point into the deep for a couple of runs, a good accurate throw but Tamim has made it back
bowled flat outside off, gets a stride out and defends
slightly short, that's crunched through extra cover into the deep for a couple more runs
gets front and across and turns it wide of midwicket for a single, good going
pitched on a length, drives it back to the bowler, Cheema palms it towards the mid-off fielder
short of a good length outside off, pushed off the back foot towards point
short and wide, shapes to play the cut, misses

dropped, Hammad Azam cannot hold on, Pakistan need to take these, short outside off and that is slashed hard, flies off the outside edge to third man, Hammad moved to his left and dived low, it carried but he couldn't hold on, a tough chance but in a chase such as this, Pakistan need to latch onto those
shortish on middle, punched off the back foot towards midwicket
back of a length on the off, knocks it down in front of point
short of a good length outside off, crunched towards extra cover
swing and a miss, Nazimuddin's under pressure here, swung hard at that one, tried to clear midwicket, missed
on a length on the off, driven straight towards extra cover
tossed up outside off, lands wide, squeezes that one down to deep cover for a single
flighted outside off, lands full, drives that one straight to extra cover
pushes that one down the ground to long-off for a single
streaky but those count, bangs it short and he tries to duck under it but his bat is in the air, knocks the back of the bat and rolls down the fine-leg boundary, brings up the 50-stand
strays on the pads, whips that off the pads wide of fine leg for a couple more runs
short of a good length on middle, punches it back towards mid-on
shortish, gets front and across and punches that towards midwicket
the innings is going along smoothly here, short of a good length, guided it behind point into the deep, wide of third man, for two more runs, Ajmal dives to his left and saves a couple
The crowd can't stop cheering, four more, short and wide, he looks to punch it square, gets a thin inside edge past the keeper to the fine-leg boundary
plays it back towards the bowler off the back foot
Nazim's not looking too comfortable, comes down the track to smash that down the ground, gets a thick inside edge for a single
takes that from outside off and paddles that towards fine leg for a single
quicker delivery, chops that towards point
short on middle, mistimes a pull towards deep square leg for a single
ooh, gets forward and chips that towards long-on for a single to keep strike
shortish, knocked through point off the back foot for a single
comes down the track to that fullish delivery and plays it back
Nazim continues to be lucky, comes down the track to smash that down the ground, gets a thick outside edge over point for a single, didn't pick the doosra
gets front and across and taps it to square leg for a single
turns in sharply from outside off, chops it towards point
comes down the track and defends it down the pitch
another half-century for Tamim, pushes that down to long-on
Nazimuddin has a swing at that one, gets an inside edge to short fine leg
Nazim is stil struggling out there, comes down the track and cracks that through cover for a couple of runs

Younis Khan takes an excellent running catch, Nazim has been put out of his misery, tossed up, made room to loft that over extra cover, loft he did but didn't get the desired distance, Younis at long-off ran a fair distance to his left and kept his eyes on that one throughout, dived and took it superbly, Bangladesh are one down
gets outside the line to that one and defends in front of the bowler
gets forward and closes the face on that one to play it into the leg side
shortish on middle, gets back and drops it back on the pitch
gets forward and closes the face on that one to play it to square leg
turns away from a good length, that was a doosra, the batsman didn't pick it and it went past the outside edge
pushes that one past the bowler, who fumbles but recovers well

another one goes! Silence around the ground, was the doosra again, turned away and Jahrul didn't pick it once again, closed the face on one that spun away, got an outside edge and it's that man Younis again at slip, reaching out to his right and snapping that one
floating it on middle, Nasir pushes it back down the pitch
tossed up on the off, drives that straight towards mid-off
short and wide, makes some room to cut that square, misses
angling it on middle, gets across and turns it towards midwicket
quicker through the air, gets forward and knocks it down in front of midwicket, no single there
gets forward and works that through square leg for a single
the googly, short outside off, moves away to chop that towards point, cut well but straight to the fielder
floating it on the off, lands on a good length, defended into th eoff side
short of a good length on the off, pushed it towards extra cover
flighted on middle, drives it down towards mid-on
gets well across to that one, turns it past square leg for a single
the doosra, waits for it to turn away and chops that to point
angling in from wide of the crease, gets forward and pushes that to midwicket
tossed up outside off, Tamim drives that down the ground to long-on for a single
bowled from wide of the crease towards middle, defended back down the pitch
short outside off, good bounce, cut down straight towards point
angling in towards middle, shortish, punched towards midwicket
drifting in towards middle, played off the back foot to midwicket
pushes that one down the ground to long-off for a single
short of a good length on middle, plays it down towards Jamshed at mid-on, picks up a single a Jamshed took some time to get to it
eases the pressure, Gul continues to go for runs against Tamim, short of a good length on leg stump, whipped through square leg to bisect that gap between fine leg and deep square leg
short of a good length, punched back towards the bowler
pitched on a length and he tries to smack that through the line, went at it hard but mistimed it to mid-off
shortish outside off, worked away through square leg into the deep for a single
gets on the back foot, opens the face and plays that towards point
bowled it full on the off, pushes it towards long-on for a single
Nasir went for the big one, tossed up from Afridi, landed on a length and then spun away, Nasir slogged at that one and missed
angling it in towards middle, played into the leg side off the back foot
chips that slightly uppishly past the diving extra cover fielder for a single
Tamim didn't pick the googly, got forward and it turned away, didn't make contact
played down the ground to long-on to keep strike

Tamim goes! Oh dear, Bangladesh in a bit of trouble now! Tamim had the wood over Gul so far this innings but not anymore, short outside off and he went for the pull, mistimed it completely, tried to go over midwicket, ended up miscuing it towards extra cover, Younis has been brilliant in the field, keeps his eyes on that one and takes it low, inches from the ground, Tamim is shocked at what he's done, stands still for a while but he has to go back
Shakib is unflustered, picks a boundary first ball, short outside off and he pulls that through midwicket to the boundary, beautifully timed
goodish length outside off, chops it down towards point
short outside off, cut away over point, down towards third man on the bounce
beaten, the legcutter, landed outside off on a good length and darted away, Nasir pushed at it loosely
short of a good length on the off, gets on the back foot and defends it to mid-on
turned in from outside off, kept low, got an inside edge onto the pads
pitched up outside off, steered towards point
the conventional legspinner, gets outside off stump, gets an inside edge onto the pads again
the googly, short and wide, shaped up to cut, missed it
he's bowling beautifully here, googly, turned away as he closed the face, was beaten there
short outside off, walks away and chops that to point, a maiden over
short of a good length on middle, gets on the back foot and defends it to point
goodish length, tries to cut it square, gets an inside edge and it bounces in front of the keeper
angling in towards middle and then appeared to cut away, was nicely behind that one, played it back to the bowler
goodish length outside off, pushes it towards extra cover from the crease
The frustration is getting to Nasir, short of a good length and he swung at that one wildly, aiming to smack it over midwicket, misses
another maiden, Gul will be relieved to get back into rhythm, pushes that towards mid-off
Keeps a little low as Shakib shapes up to sweep, misses
Shakib will feel he missed out there, called a wide, he just needed to get some bat on it, a misdirected googly, down the leg side
short outside off, turning in, chopped towards point
a swing and a miss again, the pressure is getting to both batsmen, tries to slog that over midwicket, misses, it didn't miss the off stump by much
gets a single, finally, drives that one towards long-off, the first run off the bat in 18 deliveries
shortish on the off, fires it quick, knocked away into the leg side
angling in towards middle and leg, clipped towards short fine leg
short of a good length on the off, keeps a little low, pushes it back to the bowler
Shakib swings hard at that one, fetches it from outside off and mistimes that towards midwicket
superbly fielded at point by Umar Akmal, short and wide and Shakib sensed a chance but ended up striking it straight to him
shortish outside off, chops that one down towards point
lucky, goodish length and he tries to force that off the front foot, gets an inside edge past the keeper for a couple of runs
big relief for Bangladesh, the crowd is on its feet, pitched up and that presented Shakib with an opportunity, he sliced it over point for a much-needed boundary
pushes that down the ground to long-off
slapped that towards deep cover, struck hard but just the single
angling in towards the off stump, pushes it back towards the bowler
tossed up on middle, drives it down the ground to long-on for a single
shortish on middle, turned towards square leg for a single
struck him high on the bat as he came forward to defend
angling in towards middle, pushes it back towards the bowler
played it away through square leg for a single
shortish on the off, punched back down the pitch to the bowler
short, waits for it to turn in and pulls it towards deep midwicket for a single, brings up the 100 for Bangladesh

angling in towards middle, defended towards point and set off for the single, Umar Akmal threw at the non-striker's end, a direct hit may have had him, Hafeez didn't collect cleanly, a run-out chance missed
pushes it back towards the bowler
short of a length outside off, chops it towards point
Shakib tries to heave that over midwicket, didn't come on, offcutter there and he didn't pick the change in pace
made room there, bowled it full outside off, tries to steer it past point, missed
ooh, got an inside edge there, change in pace, slower one again, got a thin inside edge, a few bounces to the keeper
a superb shot under pressure from Shakib, on a length on middle and he smacked it uppishly but wide of Younis at midwicket for a boundary
four more, poor ball from Azam, short ball down the leg side and Shakib feathers it past the keeper for a boundary, two in a row, Shakib's the man for Bangladesh from here on
tossed up outside off, pushed it gently towards extra cover
flat on middle, turned it wide of square leg for a single
angling in towards middle, drops it in front of point for a quick single
appeal for lbw, kept a little low, the umpire gives it runs, yes there was an inside edge, a single towards square leg

appeal for run-out, pushed it off the back foot through midwicket, gently played, Hammad Azam took a while to run in from the deep, threw in accurately, Sarfraz had taken off one bail before he collected the bail and dislodged the other one properly after collecting it, but Shakib had made it back in anyway with his dive
tossed up on the off, driven through to long-off to keep strike
pitched up outside off, drives that wide of long-off for a single, played it hard
pitched on a length outside off, pushes it straight to extra cover
pitched up on middle, drives it down to long-on for a single
short of a good length outside off, chops it down towards point
cramped him there, was the slower one, made a bit of room and dropped it into the off side, races off for a single as Nasir runs in
short outside off, slashes hard, flies off the outside edge to third man for a single
turned down the leg side, called a wide
shortish on the off, punched towards long-on for a single
kept a little low, shortish outside off, quicker through the air, chopped it to point
short outside off, cut away down towards deep point for a single
sliding on the pads, clipped behind square for a single into the deep
cramped him for room again, made room and pushed it back to the bowler
pushes that inside-out towards long-off for a single
Umar Akmal dives to his right at point to save a few runs, short of a good length
poor delivery, Shakib was waiting for that one, meaty full toss outside off, made room and carted that over extra cover
cracked hard, all along the ground towards deep cover for a single
nicely done from Nasir, pushes it down the ground to pick a single to long-on
short of a good length outside off, guides it down the ground to third man, raises the 50-stand, has picked up pace in the last few overs
too wide, too short, nerves for the young man, another run
short of a good length on the off, pushed towards extra cover
shortish outside off, makes room and cuts that straight to point
swings and misses, turns away as he slog-sweeps, misses the bat
the doosra, short on the off, gets on the back foot to turn it square leg for a single
four, pitched up outside off and Nasir opens up, drives it hard through the covers for a boundary
flighted on middle, drives it straight to midwicket
keeps the strike, drives that wide of mid-off for a single, six off the over, not a bad start for Bangladesh this Powerplay
turns it through square leg for a single
full toss and it's played back to the bowler, won't be too happy with that will Shakib
gets on the back foot and turns that gently towards midwicket, just the single
ooh, stopped just for a microsecond as he delivered, turned through square leg once again
went on straight, Shakib was deceived, tried to play that through the off side, went straight through and I'm not sure how that missed leg stump
tickled into the leg side towards square leg for a single
shortish on middle, gets on the back foot wide of midwicket for a single
gets forward and drops that into the off side, no single on offer there
the doosra, played softly into the leg side towards short fine, quick single
the doosra, clips the pads on the way to the keeper as he tries to turn the face
shortish outside off, chops that one towards point
wants the second but it's not available, pushed off the back foot through midwicket for a single
tossed up on middle, drilled that but struck it straight to mid-on
short on middle and leg, stabs it towards mid-on for a single
tossed up on middle, gets it towards midwicket, no run on offer there
full toss and he plays it back to the bowler, the pressure builds
came down the track and Hafeez saw that, pushed it on leg and it's played straight to midwicket
just the single, works it past midwicket for a single
shortish outside off, chops that towards point and steals a quick single
there is a deep midwicket in place, slogged towards that fielder for a single
a couple to the score, chips that one over midwicket, raises the 150 for Bangladesh
comes down the track to that shortish delivery and pads it away
waited for that one to turn in, tapped it in front of point for a single
gets on the back foot to work it into the leg side
full, wide, Shakib reaches out, finds sweeper cover with a push
Gul runs in, the yorker arrives on middle and off, dug out on to the off side
Gul goes for one more yorker, Nasir winds up and drills it past extra cover to long off
Shakib gets four, gets fifty, crowd gets excited, picks up a full delivery from middle and lifts it over midwicket
he backs away outside leg, Gul follows him, Shakib slices to short third man, there is a direct hit, Nasir is home
Shakib, you beauty! That's landed into the stands, length ball and it's in the slot for him, swings it high and handsome over deep midwicket
shortish on middle, gets a thick inside edge through square leg for a single
Nasir checked his shot at the last moment, was shaping up to swing that over midwicket but decided to stab it back to the bowler in the end
short and wide, tries to cut but he can't connect, goes through to the keeper
pushed it full on middle, drives it down the ground for a single to long-on
makes room for that one and chops that past point for a single to keep strike
lovely yorker from Gul, Shakib had already made room and Gul followed him, he managed to dig it out somehow and pinch a single
length ball on middle and Nasir swings, mistimes, goes straight to Misbah at midwicket, would have been close had that hit at the non-striker's end

Nasir goes! Stunned silence around the ground but Shakib's still out there. Banged in short, he had made up his mind to go after that one, went for the pull, didn't get hold of it and it landed safely into the palms of a calm Misbah at midwicket

low full toss on the pads, aiming for the yorker but that's the risk when you aim for those, sometimes they turn out to be low full tosses that the batsmen can dismiss, this time it's scooped for a couple past short fine
missed out there, Shakib had an opportunity, another low full toss outside off, made room and it was there for him to carve that past point but he didn't connect
Superb improvisation from Shakib, he's tired but fiercely determined, walked across to that delivery, landed on a length and he scooped it over short fine for a boundary
angles it on the pads, Mushfiqur's off the mark straightaway, clips that down to fine leg for a single
short ball, moved away and the bowler chased him, dabbed towards deep midwicket for a single
short of a good length outside off, runs that down towards third man for a single
Cheema strikes! Shakib has to go, massive, potentially decisive wicket for Pakistan. Goodish length on the leg stump, Shakib walked across to paddle it fine, missed and the stumps were pegged back
short of a good length outside off, pushed through cover for a single
short outside off, punched away off the back foot towards deep cover for a single
turned away wide of square leg for a single, wants a second but it's not there
ooh, that's a touch risky, bowled on the pads, was the doosra but the short fine is up, swept towards deep backward square for a single
turned from leg to middle, the doosra again, knocked it into the leg side for a single
drives that firmly off the front foot to long-off for a single
deft touches, Mushfiqur places that to perfection, waited for it to turn in and delicately opened the face, using the pace of the ball to play it behind point
erring in line, works it behind square for a single, behind short fine, keeps the strike

Mushfiqur holes out! Seemed to have struck it well, was a length ball on middle and he swung it high, Nasir Jamshed ran a few paces to his left from deep square leg and did a brilliant job keeping his eyes on it despite the distraction from the floodlights, took it just a few paces inside the ropes, superbly judged
Mahmudullah drives that down the ground to long-on for a single
length ball and Mashrafe connects, didn't time it too well, got it over the man at midwicket for a couple
a beamer? Slipped out of his hand there, plus a single so that's two, was a slower one there and Mashrafe moved away too quickly, the ball was dying down
slower one bowled short outside off, didn't pick the change in pace, was through his shot too early, missed
short ball on middle, pulled towards deep square leg for a single
pitched on a length outside off, crunched through wide of deep cover for a couple more runs
It's still on, folks, Mahmudullah comes down the track, takes that from a length and smashes it through the covers, powerfully struck
short of a good length on leg stump, tries to turn it fine, clips the pads and they sneak a leg-bye
Mashrafe pulls off a beauty, banged in short outside leg stump, shuffles across and shovels that over short fine leg, four more
Mashrafe's proving dangerous for Pakistan, pitched up outside off, moved away and drove it hard over extra cover, length ball and it gets the treatment, he's pumped up
swung wildly at that slower one, didn't pick it, stole a leg-bye in the end
superbly bowled by Gul but that's an expensive over, yorker and Mahmudullah did well to dig it out, Mashrafe's back on strike for the next over
three more, superbly fielded by Azam, he ran a mile from long-off and dragged it just in, Mashrafe made room and slapped that over extra cover
wisely played, a single chopped down towards point, Mashrafe's back on strike
moves back and swats that over extra cover for two more, Azam runs across and cuts it off

another twist, Mashrafe was trying to be cheeky there, Ajmal went round the stumps and tried to paddle it over short fine, couldn't, Jamshed was placed perfectly there and took a nervous catch falling ahead, effective though
swing and a miss, tries to send that over long-on, it turns away and beats the bat
in the blockhole outside off, digs it out back to the bowler
yorker on middle, good stuff from Gul, digs it out over the bowler for a single
run-out appeal, drives it off a length to mid-off, Hafeez picks up and scores a direct-hit but Razzak is in, a massive stretch to make it in and he succeeds
freehit coming up, Gul has bowled a no-ball, he has overstepped at the wrong time, a single to deep midwicket, pressure, pressure
just manages a couple, a fast full toss, squeezes that one past midwicket for a couple of runs
made room and he chased him, a yorker, dug out into the leg side for a single
he had made up his mind, third man is up and Mahmudullah targeted that area, came forward and smartly steered that but straight to Ajmal there, just the single
gets a couple, Mahmudullah will take strike the final over, moved away to off and worked it through square leg for a couple, excellent running to make it back
leading edge, tried to shuffle across and paddle it over short fine, went instead to third man, just the single
moved across to work it past short fine, that's the area they'd been looking at, just a leg bye as it knocks his thighs
missed the slower one, was the legcutter, and Mahmudullah didn't pick that, was into the shot too early, dot ball

What a mess, three runs, three runs, pitched up outside off, driven towards long-off, a wayward throw towards the striker's end that allows them to complete the second and Sarfraz's attempted flick onto the stumps misses it's mark and it's an overthrow

Bowled'im! He had made up his mind to carve that over short fine leg, he was up in the circle, was the slower one, he walked well across but ended up playing it onto the stumps, eight down now, Mahmudullah will not be on strike
yorker on leg stump and he can only dig it out into the leg side for a single, Pakistan have taken the title, joy for Pakistan, despair for Bangladesh but they've done themselves proud
